about.name: I'M MARIA
about.bio:
I'm Maria Leningradskaya — a lifestyle and portrait photographer based in Illinois. For the past **7 years**, families, couples, women, and men have trusted me to capture the moments that truly matter — whether it's a milestone, a personal portrait session, or photos for a business portfolio.

As a mom of two daughters, I know just how important it is to preserve family memories. I absolutely love working with kids and creating natural, heartfelt portraits.

Photography is more than a job to me — it's my passion. I'm based in Chicago and shoot throughout Illinois, and I'm always open to travel for sessions in other states too.

services.title: NEWBORN
services.description: Tender, intimate sessions capturing the first precious days of your baby's life.

services.title: FAMILY
services.description: Heartfelt family sessions capturing the love and laughter that makes your family unique.

services.title: BABY LIFESTYLE
services.description: Playful sessions documenting milestones and those fleeting moments of childhood.

reviews.name: SELBI
reviews.text: Maria is incredibly talented and made our family feel so comfortable. The photos turned out absolutely stunning — we will treasure them forever!

reviews.name: GALINA
reviews.text: The newborn session was magical. Maria was so patient and gentle with our baby, and the resulting images are works of art.

reviews.name: MARINA
reviews.text: We've done three sessions with Maria and each time the photos get better. She truly captures the essence of our family.

reviews.name: VIKTORIIA
reviews.text: I was nervous about our first photoshoot, but Maria made everything so natural. The photos look like they belong in a magazine!

reviews.name: KARINA
reviews.text: Maria has a gift for capturing genuine emotions. Every single photo tells a story. We are so grateful!
